channel.title: Comments on: T. Boone Pickens Is Wrong – It’s not the oil we import it’s what we use it for

item.title: By: DougNic
item.dc:creator: DougNic
item.description: thanks chris for the valuable comment. believe it or not i have one clipped to my backdoor so i see it whenever i go out...i by the stores bags to (schnucks, iga, etc.) because it encourages them to produce more and they are only a $. i keep them in the trunk so they are always there. this wastes a little gas to transport them but geez i only have 4.
item.content:encoded: thanks chris for the valuable comment. believe it or not i have one clipped to my backdoor so i see it whenever i go out…i by the stores bags to (schnucks, iga, etc.) because it encourages them to produce more and they are only a $. i keep them in the trunk so they are always there. this wastes a little gas to transport them but geez i only have 4.

item.title: By: Chris
item.dc:creator: Chris
item.description:
Taking advantage of reusable bags is such an easy way to do something helpful, it's unfortunate I don't see many do it in my area (62704). I often hear from people that they own some, but forget them often. My solution is the chicobag. They collapse into a built-in pouch that literally fits into the palm of your hand, and they have a clip that lets you easily clip them on a belt-loop. I keep 3 in my car center console and clip them on my belt when shopping. They hold up well and are strong!
No I don't work for them, but I get so many positive comments on them I thought I'd pass the link: http://www.chicobag.com/
item.content:encoded:
Taking advantage of reusable bags is such an easy way to do something helpful, it’s unfortunate I don’t see many do it in my area (62704). I often hear from people that they own some, but forget them often. My solution is the chicobag. They collapse into a built-in pouch that literally fits into the palm of your hand, and they have a clip that lets you easily clip them on a belt-loop. I keep 3 in my car center console and clip them on my belt when shopping. They hold up well and are strong!

No I don’t work for them, but I get so many positive comments on them I thought I’d pass the link:
http://www.chicobag.com/
